title: Getting Started
content:
Getting Started # When you first sign up to a company, you’ll need to create an account. After you’ve created an account, you’ll be offered a choice:
To create a company To join a company Creating a company # When creating a company, the name must be unique. Also, you can only be attached one to company at a time. If you wish to leave a company, please contact support.
Joining a company # Adding a new user to your company #

title: Feature-Switches
content: Feature Switches # Creating a switch # Updating a switch # Context Rules # Default Rule #
